channel.title: ubuntu on Ritesh's Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in ubuntu on Ritesh's Ramblings

item.title: Not one Music player
item.description: All I want is for my podcasts to automatically sync with my ancient iPod. So far, not one media player on Ubuntu Karmic can accomplish this. Tried Rhythmbox, banshee, Amarok. FFFFFFUUUUUUUUUU!!!!

item.title: Quick/Lazy hack to install Ubuntu 9.04 using existing GRUB
item.description: Prior to using any Debian derivatives, I was a RedHat fan and hence heavily favoured Fedora/CentOS/RHEL over other distributions. Over the last few releases Fedora has been a disappointment and I was stuck between using Gentoo/Ubuntu. Hell I even gave FreeBSD a shot (sucked for me). Gentoo was my favoured distribution about 2-3 years ago but the excessive kernel recompilation was really getting to me. To go the more stable path I decided to give Debian a shot.
